titleStmt.title: An exposition continued upon the sixt, seventh, eighth, ninth, tenth, eleventh, twelfth, and thirteenth chapters of the prophet Ezekiel, with useful observations thereupon. Delivered in severall lectures in London, By William Greenhill.
titleStmt.author: Greenhill, William, 1591-1671.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M.S. for Hanna Allen, at the Crowne in Popes-head-Alley,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
